Text: COOL !! love their sound so much, thank you for your post !!!!!

thanks for your comment. indeed, a unique sound.

i found out about them watching Mongol (2007) movie, you might enjoy it (they made the soundtrack). http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0416044/
I've seen these guys a few times now.  They play all the time at Ikh Mongol in Ulaanbaatar.  They're the only group I know of that mixes the traditional Mongolian sound with a new twist like this.
wow man this is hot weird stuff thankx a lot niggas
